name: Tumbly Turtle
description:
Cute little puzzle game about a turtle's topsy turvy quest for carrots.

Controls:

WASD/arrow keys for movement.

E / numpad 0 - Undo

R - Reset Level

P - Skip Level

M - Mute Music

Assets used:

  • Music is "Caketown" by Matthew Pablo.
  • Nature, Food, and Cars packs from the excellent kenney.nl
  • Font: Delius by Natalia Raices
  • Sounds from Zapsplat.com

This game was made within 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK game jam.

Made by FidgetBear Games, that's me!
